Function reference

stat1201

stat1201
STAT1201 Equation Library

Base

Base functions used throughout.

mode_stats()
Mode of from values
population_sd()
Population Standard Deviation
sample_sd()
Sample Standard Deviation
`%ni%`
Not Value Matching
outliers()
Outliers
z_test()
z-test
z_crit()
Z Critical
t_test()
t-test
t_crit()
t Critical
p_evidence()
p value Strength
interval()
Confidence Interval
stats_print()
Print Stats
generate_frame()
Generate data.frame

Probability Distributions

Probability distributions and sampling distributions

stand_normal()
Standardize a normal distribution
central_limit()
Central Limit Theorem to Standardize a normal distribution
discrete_dist()
Discrete Probability Distribution
binom_dist()
Binomial Distribution
sampling_dist_mean()
Sampling Distribution of the Sample Mean
sampling_dist_prop()
Sampling Distribution of the Sample Proportions
sampling_dist_prop_norm()
Transform phat ~ Normal(p, sd(phat)) into standard normal form.

One Sample

Student’s t Distribution

one_sample_se()
One Sample Standard Error
one_sample_t()
One Sample Student's t-test

Two Sample

Comparing two population means

two_sample_assumptions()
Two Sample t-test Assumptions
two_sample_se()
Two Sample Standard Error
two_sample_t()
Two Sample t-test SD's Not Equal
pooled_S2p()
Pooled Variance
pooled_se()
Pooled Standard Error
pooled_t()
Pooled t-test SD's Equal
two_prop_assumptions()
Two Proportions t-test Assumptions
two_prop_se()
Two Proportions Standard Error
two_prop_z()
Two Proportions z-test

Proportions

Comparing one and two population proportions

one_prop_se()
One Sample Proportion Standard Error
one_prop_z()
One Sample Proportion z-test
two_prop_assumptions()
Two Proportions t-test Assumptions
two_prop_se()
Two Proportions Standard Error
two_prop_z()
Two Proportions z-test
prop_moe()
Proportion Margin of Error

Correlation

Correlation between two variables

correlation_df()
Correlation Between Two Variables DF
correlation_se()
Correlation Standard Error
correlation_t()
Correlation t-test

Linear Regression

Simple and multiple linear regression

slr_se()
Simple Linear Regression Standard Error
slr_t()
Simple Linear Regression t-stat
lr_assumptions()
Linear Regression Assumptions
lr_df()
Linear Regression Degrees of Freedom
lr_moe()
Linear Regression Margin of Error

ANOVA

One and Two way Analaysis of Variance

anova_assumptions()
ANOVA Assumptions
anova_f()
ANOVA f-stat from MSG and MSR
anova_msg()
ANOVA Mean Squares Group
anova_msr()
ANOVA Mean Squares Residuals
anova_mst()
ANOVA Mean Squares Total
f_test()
ANOVA f-test

Chi-Square

Chi-Square test for independence and Chi-Square goodness of fit test

xsq_test()
Chi-Square X^2-test
chisq_gof()
Chi-Square Goodness of Fit Test
chisq_indep()
Chi-Square Test for Independence
chisq_indep_df()
Chi-Square Independence Degrees of Freedom
chisq_indep_expected()
Chi-Square Independence Expected Frequency

Logistic Regression

logistic_groups()
Logistic Regression to Compare Odds Between Groups
logistic_moe()
Logistic Regression Margin of Error
logistic_odds()
Odds
logistic_or()
Odds Ratio (OR)
logistic_phat()
Logistic Regression phat

Non-Parametric Methods

Sign-test, Wilcoxon Signed-Rank test, Wilcoxon Rank-Sum test

signed_rank()
Signed-Rank z-test with Normal Approximation
signed_rank_expected()
Signed-Rank Expected Mean with Normal Approximation
signed_rank_sd()
Signed-Rank Standard Deviation with Normal Approximation
rank_assumptions()
Signed-Rank Assumptions (Maybe Sum-Rank too?)
rank_sum()
Rank-Sum z-test (Wilcoxon Rank-Sum test)
rank_sum_expected()
Rank-Sum Expected Mean With Normal Approximation
rank_sum_sd()
Rank-Sum standard Deviation With Normal Approximation
